English: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul.

Urdu: خودی کو کر بلند کرنا کے ہر تقدیر سے پہلے،، خدا بندے سے خود پوچھے بتا تیری رضا کیا ہے
English: Raise yourself to such heights that before every destiny,, God himself asks you, what is your wish?
Roman Urdu: Khudi ko kar buland itna ke har taqdeer se pehle,, Khuda bande se khud pooche bata teri raza kya hai.

English: The best portion of a good man's life,, His little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.

Urdu: دلِ نادان تجھے ہوا کیا ہے،، آخر اس درد کی دوا کیا ہے
Roman Urdu: Dil-e-nadaan tujhe hua kya hai,, Aakhir is dard ki dawa kya hai.
English: O naive heart, what has happened to you,, What is the remedy for this pain, after all?
Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls,, The most massive characters are seared with scars.
Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
